BiomeDef.label: Bespin
BiomeDef.description: Bespin is an immense gas giant located in the vicinity of the Anoat system, a desolate sector of the galaxy. Bespins gaseous mass contains a thin stratum of habitable atmosphere. [Ocean]

BiomeDef.label: Bespin
BiomeDef.description: Bespin is an immense gas giant located in the vicinity of the Anoat system, a desolate sector of the galaxy. Bespins gaseous mass contains a thin stratum of habitable atmosphere. [Lake]
